From what i have read in other railworks downloads....alot of these ripped activities and rolling stock wont work if your hooked into steam.
Also its good to read up or get to know the game software your dealing with so no issues like with unpacking the RWP in package manager...RWP files are just like a zip files but can only be opened in Train sim. tpb 4 ever does a great job of uploading these files. Everything i have got from him works like a dream....if you follow the directions!

Make sure that you run this in the skidrow version of Railworks. All the trains and scenarios are there.

Go here to see what is included : steampowered.com/app/65249/

Im using Skidrow 11.0b of version of TS2012, not hooked into steam either. If you check package manager and highlight the DB Freight addon after installing the .rwp file all you have installed is an "Assets" dir with all the  trains and rolling stock in it. There is no "Routes" dir installed which is where the scenarios are kept.
    Just cant seem to get this one working tbp_4_ever apart from editing a free roam scenario and adding trains and rolling stock that way.
The routes are default so they're not included as they should be there anyway.  The routes are Hagen-Siegen and Seebergbahn
